name: Cartel Aristocrat
text: Sacrifice another creature: Cartel Aristocrat gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

editions.flavor: "Your life serves a higher purpose now: ensuring the continuation of my own."

name: Cartographer
text: When Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor: "Finding the way once is luck. Finding the way twice takes a good map."
How do you map a world when the land moves beneath your feet?

name: Carven Caryatid
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Carven Caryatid enters the battlefield, draw a card.

editions.flavor: So-called "old wood" is rare in deforested Ravnica. Statues carved from it are said to house the last of the ancient nature spirits.

name: Cascade Bluffs
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{U/R}, {T}: Add {U}{U}, {U}{R}, or {R}{R} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: Travelers bathe in the falls to wash away curses from the pucas who lurk nearby.

name: Castigate
text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.

editions.flavor:
"We have no need for military might. We wield two of the sharpest swords ever forged: Faith in our left hand, Wealth in our right."
—Vuliev of the Ghost Council

"We have no need for military might. We wield two of the sharpest swords ever forged: Faith in our left hand, Wealth in our right."
—Vuliev of the Ghost Council

Enchant creature

Archmage of the Unseen

name: Cast into Darkness
text:
Enchant creature

editions.flavor: In desperation the soldier prayed to Phenax, begging for the power to cheat the gorgon's gaze.

name: Castle
text: Untapped creatures you control get +0/+2.

editions.flavor:

Flying

{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.

{2}, {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: Where hope has no champion, evil rules all.

name: Cast Through Time
text: Instant and sorcery spells you control have rebound. (Exile the spell as it resolves if you cast it from your hand. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Cataclysm
text: Each player chooses from among the permanents he or she controls an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a land, then sacrifices the rest.

editions.flavor: The Weatherlight dragged the Predator behind it, the cradle hauling the casket.

"Keep with you only this much: your mount, your blade, and your wits. The rest you can find, build, or take."
—Horse clans' wisdom
The Weatherlight dragged the Predator behind it, the cradle hauling the casket.

name: Cataclysmic Gearhulk
text:
Vigilance
When Cataclysmic Gearhulk enters the battlefield, each player chooses an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker from among the nonland permanents he or she controls, then sacrifices the rest.

name: Catacomb Dragon
text:
Flying
Whenever Catacomb Dragon becomes blocked by a nonartifact, non-Dragon creature, that creature gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is half the creature's power, rounded down.

name: Catacomb Sifter
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)

name: Catalog

"The appearance of these warped stones throughout the provinces is too pervasive to be random. More evidence is needed to determine the reason behind them."

—Chinese proverb

name: Catalyst Stone
text:
Flashback costs you pay cost up to {2} less.
Flashback costs your opponents pay cost {2} more.

editions.flavor: The gems' incandescence invades the dreams of all who see them.

name: Catastrophe
text: Destroy all lands or all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

editions.flavor: The il-Kor no longer roam the open plains, but they are still hunters.

text:
Gain control of target permanent until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

"Unwavering and loyal, they represent stability in uncertain times."
—Rem Karolus, Slayer of Angels

name: Cathars' Crusade

editions.flavor:

—Thalia, heretic cathar

name: Cathartic Adept
text: {T}: Target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

editions.flavor: "Forget. Only then will there be space for hope between the pain and fear."

text:

name: Cathedral of Serra
text: White legendary creatures you control have "bands with other legendary creatures." (Any legendary creatures can attack in a band as long as at least one has "bands with other legendary creatures." Bands are blocked as a group. If at least two legendary creatures you control, one of which has "bands with other legendary creatures," are blocking or being blocked by the same creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
